entries.description: Allow customers to disable read and write timeout by setting `Duration.ZERO` to `readTimeout` and `writeTimeout`. See [#1281](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/issues/1281)
Adds DNS entries and NLB ARNs to describe-vpc-endpoint-connections API response. Adds owner ID to describe-vpc-endpoints and create-vpc-endpoint API responses.
